ygData.subject: Re: Grobb Cleaver
ygData.msgSnippet: The named Troll sanding next to the hanging dwarf by the Bank. BTW, if you try this quest, you have to kill a Troll to get the recipe and you will lose faction
ygData.messageBody:
The named Troll sanding next to the hanging dwarf by the Bank. BTW, if you
try this quest, you have to kill a Troll to get the recipe and you will
lose faction with the bashers.

-Nuluk(E'ci)

>
> -Nuluk (E'ci)
